entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pickering
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:46 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
